subject: Order #SSN4188
description_text:
Hello Simsonn team,

I hope you are doing well.

I recently ordered your new *HS Pro Shifter H/SQ Dual Mode Racing Simulator
Shifter*.
According to the information on your website, shipments were supposed to
start on *December 15th*, but as of today (December 17th), I havenâ€™t
received any update yet.

I just wanted to check in to see if you could share any information
regarding the status of my order and the expected shipping timeline.

Thank you in advance for your help.

Best regards,
*Arnaud*

conversations.body_text: Hi Arnaud,     We will send HS Pro out this week.
